DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the SEPLUS study is to evaluate the patients characteristics associated with adherence to Betaferon over a 24-month follow up period after the initiation of Betaferon in the BetaPlus program
DOC.brief_title: Prospective, Multicenter Non Interventional Study to Evaluate Adherence to Betaferon Over a 2 Years Period
DOC.criteria: Male or female >/= 18 years old Outpatient with a confirmed diagnosis of RecurrentRemittent multiple sclerosis or patients at high risk of developing multiple sclerosis after a first demyelinating clinical event Patient who initiated Betaferon as described by SmPC less than 2 months ago. The decision of physician is clearly separated from the decision to include the patient in the study Treatment na√Øve patients before the initiation of Betaferon OR Patients having interrupted Betaferon for more than 6 months before to start again OR Patients receiving a disease modifying drug (DMD) other than Betaferon Patient with EDSS score < 4 Patients approved and signed an inform consent and approved the collect of their data Contraindications and warning of the respective Summary of Product Characteristics
